{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$3.7M in 2021-2022** on contracts with GRC ARCHITECTS.

Across 15 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 11 have at least one amendment (73%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 66% and the average number of amendments was 2.45. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$6.9M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 2.05 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$1.0M. The longest contract was 6.18 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$9.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
